snippet: France stunned Canada in their first game of the world championships, winning, 3-2, after a shootout in Minsk, Belarus.
abstract: France beats Canada, 3-2, in first game of the world ice hockey championships.
lead_paragraph: France stunned Canada in their first game of the world championships, winning, 3-2, after a shootout in Minsk, Belarus.

headline.main: France Upsets Canada in Worlds Opener
headline.print_headline: France Upsets Canada in Worlds Opener
